name: Rot & Blau
description:
A pair of competitive friends play through some games to prove who is better.

You and your friend always discuss for everything? 
Now you can solve that like mature men playing a Rot & Blau game!

Choose from 3 to 10 fast rounds where only one player can win. Every round add a point to the scoreboard. When the rounds finish, you will know who is the best. 

Remember, it can only be one winner!

We hope you enjoy it!

This game was born as an university project. It was developed in Processing software using JAVA language. It will be updated in the future but you already can download and play it. 

[Credits]

Art Design: Manuel Briceño P.
